title: My ADC and support are BOTH auto-filled. This should not happen in ranked, period.
body:
Why is this even still a thing? 

There's no excuse for allowing a ranked game like this to happen. If one side is at a clear, detectable disadvantage (i.e. because not one, but two, players are auto-filled), the game shouldn't be made and we should be kept in queue.

This is even less acceptable when you consider that the system auto-fills people just for the hell of it, and not necessarily to reduce queue times.

replies.body:
>Why is this even still a thing?

Because you guys dont play ADC or Supp, since you all queue as Mid well, autofill happens
translate: i got fucked by bot lane.

I don't even get auto fill at times. One time I was Support or Jungle, the two hardest to find rolls. And I got auto filled mid! Fucking Mid! How did that even happen? Last i checked mid was the most poplar role in the game
